coreAttributes.clothingAuthorTag: A tag discreetly sewn into the back of the shorts informs you that it was made by 'Serpentia Silk&Satin Ltd.'.
coreAttributes.name: asymmetrical shorts
coreAttributes.description: A pair of very tight asymmetrical lycra shorts. The elastic material hugs to the wearer's body, showing off their curves. For some unknown reason, the designer decided to remove one leg on this example.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(step)] into the asymmetrical shorts, before pulling them up to fit around [npc.her] waist.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(get)] [npc2.name] to step into the asymmetrical shorts, before pulling them up to fit around [npc2.her] waist.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(force)] [npc2.name] to step into the asymmetrical shorts, before yanking them up to fit around [npc2.her] waist.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] down [npc.her] asymmetrical shorts, before slipping them off.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] down [npc2.namePos] asymmetrical shorts, before slipping them off.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] down [npc2.namePos] asymmetrical shorts, before yanking them off.
